Lonely #15, Alexis Borja 1st

Posted on April 7, 2012 by mike

On February 23rd, 2008, I shot an amazing gal by the name of Alexis Borja. Little did I know that she’d actually shoot with me again, end up in my book 3 times, love hearing stories about the impact Burning Man has made on my life, go to Burning Man in 2011….and….then introduce me to the boyfriend she attended Burning Man with! And, why does that matter. Well, that killer cool dude by the name of Ray has actually designed this whole damn website & blog which you’re reading right now! Yeah, Ray, you rock and so does that stunning woman named Alexis! My hope is that she’ll show in Lonely Roads 2nd Edition several times as well….and, perhaps….when I blog that forthcoming shoot you’ll actually see Ray baring his ass next to her not just some random (handsome, intelligent, funny, entertaining, charismatic) guy! 🙂

So, Alexis and I had met and discussed shooting back in January of 2008. She was attending school in Tempe, AZ and I was about 45 minutes away. So, we decided I’d pick her up on a Saturday, hop on the Beeline Hwy heading up the mountains toward Payson, AZ and completely wing it on finding a cool, lonely road. And, sure as shit…we did!

There’d been some weather which created a crisp, vivid sky and the clouds that day were to die for. Capturing Alexis in pinks next to a cactus and some recently erupting green vegetation just turned out to be incredible. And the B&W shots we also shot were so dramatic with the sky. Man…killer stuff. Loved the addition of the umbrella and particularly adore the see-thru black undies from American Apparel. Man…what a cute & fun & sweet gal. Alexis…thanks for playing such a role in this book and thanks too for introducing me to Ray. Oh, and if you sooo fall in love with my photography and blog that you come visit my house someday????…..well????….I’ll show you the gift photo Ray & Alexis took for me at Burning Man 2011. If it surprises you…..it involves butts. Sandy ones to boot!



🙂

FYI…pages 10 and 27 of “The Lonely Road” feature Ms. Borja as shot this day!

Buy it!!!
